content: from * to * across the row work the fisherman s rib back and forth row 1 k 1 *p 1 k 1 in the stitch below* repeat from* to * across the row k 1 row 2 repeat row 1 work row 1 and 2 for 5 cm and on the last row k2tog knit until 2 sts k2tog to shape the head join in the round and work 2 cm in stockinette stitch cut the yarn pull it through the stitches and tighten to close the head wings the wings are worked flat in garter stitch using german short row from top to bottom cast on 21 sts on 3 5 mm needles and knit the first row row 1 k 7 stitches turn knit back row 2 knit 1 row repeat row 1 and 2 a total of 6 times decrease for the lower part row 1 k2tog k 6 sts turn knit back row 2 knit 1 row repeat row 1 and 2 until 15 sts remain then work *k2tog knit to the end of the row* repeat from * to * until 9 sts remain bind off finishing stuff the head with wool and pass a thread through the stitches to tighten the neck using the same yarn you used for the neck sew the back of the body together with mattress stitch and attach the wings share your sweet little angel with us by tagging @strikk it_yarnshop
